# Simple Statistics utility (sstats)

Compute common statistic analysis on lists of numbers.

# Usage

Simply pipe a list of line separated numbers.
```
$ cat numbers.txt
0.6046602879796196
0.9405090880450124
0.6645600532184904
0.4377141871869802
0.4246374970712657
0.6868230728671094
0.06563701921747622
0.15651925473279124
0.09696951891448456
0.30091186058528707

$ sstats < numbers.txt
Count:  10
Min:    0.06563701921747622
Max:    0.9405090880450124
Sum:    4.378941839818516

$ cat numbers.txt | sstats
Count:  10
Min:    0.06563701921747622
Max:    0.9405090880450124
Sum:    4.378941839818516

```
